Class Vehicle

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.shape.Shape
javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle
com.simulus.view.vehicles.Vehicle
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
Direct Known Subclasses:
Car, Truck
public abstract class Vehicle extends javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle
The base class for all vehicles represented in the simulation. Vehicles are an extension to Rectangle.

  • Property Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Vehicle

      public Vehicle(double posX, double posY, double width, double height, Direction dir)
      Initialises the position and size of the vehicle
      Parameters:
      posX - The position of the vehicle on X
      posY - The position of the vehicle on Y
      width - The width of the vehicle
      height - The height of the vehicle
      dir - The direction the vehicle should move in

  • Method Details

    • moveVehicle

      public abstract void moveVehicle()
      Describes a vehicle translation

    • move

      public void move(Direction d)
      Moves the vehicle, i.e. the rectangle in its current direction. The vehicle accelerates with each call of this method and is then moved according to the resulting speed.
      Parameters:
      d - The direction the vehicle is moving in.

    • overtake

      public void overtake(Tile moveToTile)
      Moves the vehicle to the passed tile with a transition.
      Parameters:
      moveToTile - The tile to move to.

    • changeLane

      public void changeLane()
      Makes the vehicle change into its adjacent lane if possible

    • allowMerge

      public void allowMerge()
      Slows down the vehicle and forces a higher distance to the car in front

    • checkTransitionBlockage

      public void checkTransitionBlockage()
      Checks the intersection this vehicle is currently in for occupied tiles and occupies the tiles that this vehicle currently intersects. If the vehicle touches on a tile that is occupied by another vehicle, the transition is paused.

    • updateTransitionTiles

      public void updateTransitionTiles()

    • followPath

      public void followPath(CustomPath p)
      Makes the vehicle follow a provided CustomPath. Is used to make vehicles move through intersections as soon as they encounter an IntersectionTile with active paths.
      Parameters:
      p - The path to follow

    • removeFromCanvas

      public void removeFromCanvas()
      Removes this car from the canvas it is drawn on.

    • addToCanvas

      public void addToCanvas()
      Adds this vehicle to the canvas that is set as its parent.
      See Also:
      • Node.parentProperty()

    • getDirection

      public Direction getDirection()

    • setDirection

      public void setDirection(Direction dir)

    • setMap

      public void setMap(Tile[][] map)

    • setCurrentTile

      public void setCurrentTile(Tile t)

    • getCurrentTile

      public Tile getCurrentTile()

    • removeTile

      public void removeTile(Tile t)
      Removes a tile from the set of tiles occupied by this vehicle.
      Parameters:
      t - The tile to be removed.

    • getOccupiedTiles

      public List<Tile> getOccupiedTiles()
      Returns:
      A list of the tiles that this vehicle currently occupies.

    • getVehicleSpeed

      public double getVehicleSpeed()

    • setVehicleSpeed

      public void setVehicleSpeed(double d)

    • setBehavior

      public void setBehavior(Behaviour b)

    • getBehavior

      public Behaviour getBehavior()

    • getWaitedCounter

      public int getWaitedCounter()

    • isTransitioning

      public boolean isTransitioning()
      Returns:
      true if this vehicle is currently executing a transition, false otherwise.

    • getCurrentTransition

      public javafx.animation.Transition getCurrentTransition()

    • getCurrentPath

      public CustomPath getCurrentPath()

      public String toString()
